property_name: 3Bedroom  3Baths Independent House/Villa for Rent in A Block Sector 46, Noida
nearby_places: M B Lal Memorial Clinic Pvt Ltd

meta_data.description: 1750 Sq. Ft. - Rent 3 BHK Independent house / Villa in A Block Sector 46 Noida * 22 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished. View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description:
Property description
Experience the perfect blend of space and style in this beautiful residence occupying a peaceful street position. 
Designed and conceptualized to suit your lifestyle, this house provides simple, functional, private, and light-Filled spaces for a family. It is a newly renovated house comprising 3 bedrooms with built in wardrobes and 3 attach bathrooms, fully equipped modular kitchen with chimney , installed, and a balcony to gather fresh air and enjoy the view of color fountain over the residential area. There is an additional almirah with built in dressing room. 
Adorned by beautiful interior specification, complete house is furnished with marble flooring. All the windows and doors have mosquito mesh. It is just opposite to a park and allows ample flow of daylight and natural air. 
Within a peaceful and calm residential area, it offers facilities such as:
- Security guards in sector gate
- Cctv cameras with mobile access
- Electronic locks
- Separate water tank for each floor
- Cable tv
- Servant quarter (At additional cost)
- Png pipeline
- Utility space adjoining the kitchen
- Ganga water supply
- Submersible tank
- Power backup through inverter 
- Ample parking space for your convenience. 

The property is conveniently located nearby express way and provides easy access to sector 62, 125, 126, nsez, dadri road and is just at the back of amity school sector 44. It is just 1km from hospital, 100m from market, 100m from taxi stand, 1km from school, 3 km from metro station and less than a km from temple, making it a perfect place for you and your family. 
We are not allowed prepration of nin veg food in side house.
And pet is not allowed.
